attributes.action: Start donating COVID vaccines to 3rd world countries.
attributes.additional_details: Whilst the UK and USA are fairing better with the pandemic with the release of the vaccine, third world countries are being left behind and need Government support lending vaccines to decrease their cases, support their healthcare systems and protect their vulnerable from succumbing to the virus. We've seen too many dying, it’s time to help out on a global scale as one of the top economies in the world should.
attributes.background: The UK has had a quick and efficient vaccine rollout with over 44 million vaccinated covering nearly all our vulnerable, 3rd world countries need support from our vaccines to protect their vulnerable too. Start a programme handing out vaccines to vulnerable people globally.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Donate surplus Covid-19 vaccine doses to poorer countries: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565462

Once priority groups in the UK are vaccinated redirect Covid-19 vaccines abroad: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572802

Begin distributing 50% of UK vaccine supplies to poorer countries immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576325
